title: Lori's sweet n' tangy salmon
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place salmon filet on greased aluminum foil on cookie sheet. (Foil needs to be big enough to form tent or steam pocket for salmon) Combine all other ingredients in small mixing bowl. Pour ingredients over salmon filet. Bake for 20-25 minutes. Makes 5-6 5oz servings.
